Guitars

  /  Bass

Build your own Bass

I’m not going to patronise you with a snappy headline, I love making basses, I would love to make you one. Check them out. If you can’t see what you would like then get in touch. I can probably make what you want.

Let’s be honest. Basses are cooler than guitars. I can write this here, publically for all to see, as all guitarists are too busy searching my site for the various colour options of binding to match the LEDs of their spaceship pedal boards, to come onto the bass section of my page.

All prices listed on the site are excluding sales tax, but if you’re outside the EU you won't be charged it ( you may be charge import duties though)

Testimonials

My bass is a beast, and whatsmore, it arrived in tune! It’s light, comfortable and I can get all the sounds out of it that I want.

Jake, USA

This bass is an Extremely expressive instrument which reacts to how I play it. Love the bass, fits in the mix and allows me to groove!

Ross, London
